title: Increase Product Awareness and Reduce CAC
description:
Time Management and Resouce Allocation playes vital role in affecting Customer Accusation Cost (CAC) in terms of investment on production and management, and loosing time for more innovation and business aqisitions. 
 Lets discuss more on why this is relevent to this product.

content.subtitle: Problem Discovery
content.subcontent:
1. Customer often raised questions asking if the product listed on website is 2nd hand? 

 2. Can they get same product designs for different competition catgories? 

 3. Too many repetitive questions during Consulation sessions.

content.subtitle: Goals
content.subcontent:
1. Make customers understand that every product is bespoke / customizable and made to order. 

 2. Reduce avoidable Consulation booking.

content.subtitle: Approach
content.subcontent: Based on customer interactions and personas registered, changes were made around "Product page" and "3D Product Configurator" based on usability testing and customer usage pattern around the product booking flow.

conclusion.conclusionDesc:
1. Improved customer satisfaction 

 2. Reduced inquiries about product authenticity, and reduced bounce rate by 10%. 

 3. Improved after purchase experience.

note.noteTitle: Note to self & whoever is reading
note.noteDesc:
> After working on a product for long enough, user persona helps stay on track to remember the behavior of the target audience.It prevents us from taking any biased decisions.

 > Interacting directly with customer can save a lot of time.

 > Frequent and drastic changes can be too stressful for existing customer, so be mindful about it when doing A/B testing.

title: Increase Product Awareness and Reduce CAC
description: CAC covers range of elements not just money but the management of time and resource allocation. To reduce engagement on things which should be understood naturally and help users to get what they wish to get, certain design changes were made which is represented below.

content.subtitle: Problem Discovery
content.subcontent: Customer often raised questions asking if the product listed on website is 2nd hand?

content.subtitle: Goals
content.subcontent: Make customers understand that every product is bespoke / customizable and made to order.

content.subtitle: Implementation & Approach
content.subcontent: Based on common behavior of certain customer range, we created User Personas and made changes across touchpoints specifics to product info and purchase and areas outside our website, ie, social media platforms and consultation meetings.

conclusion.conclusionDesc: Improved customer satisfaction, reduced inquiries about product authenticity, and reduced bounce rate by 10%.

note.noteTitle: Note to self & whoever is reading
note.noteDesc:
1. After working on a product for long enough, user persona helps stay on track to remember the behavior of the target audience.It prevents us from taking any biased decisions.

 2. Interacting directly with customer can save a lot of time.

 3. Frequent and drastic changes can be too stressful for existing customer, so be mindful about it when doing A/B testing.
